text: Lee Young-min (; born 20 December 1973) is a South Korean former footballer and current manager of FC Anyang. He played as defender. ==Career== He was appointed as an interim manager of FC Anyang on 16 June 2015. He was promoted to full-time manager on 9 November. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:South Korean footballers Category:South Korean football managers Category:Pohang Steelers players Category:Goyang KB Kookmin Bank FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:Korea National League players Category:FC Anyang managers Category:Sportspeople from Busan
title: Lee Young-min (footballer, born 1973)
